comment: Professor Davis is a sweet lady. She genuinely wants to help you, but you must swallow your pride and do exactly as she says. She is very talkative, be respectful and do not interrupt her. If you can follow directions youâ€™ll do just fine!

Every time is story time in Davis' math class! But seriously, she is very sweet if you do your work and read directions carefully. She makes reviews for the test that are almost exactly like the test. Easiest math class I've ever taken.

Her overall class is not hard, but she is very picky of how she wants things. FOLLOW DIRECTIONS. I messed up on the first few quizzes because I did not write out the problems in the correct format. She knows what she is talking about and tends to go thought the material quickly. Lastly, she does replace your lowest test grade with your final.

She starts off the semester really easy and then gets hard. Really inconciderate. Not much help when asking for help. She just shows you the answer book (Which is the same one you can buy) very uptight about small things like the format of your papers and won't grade quizzes if turned in 3 seconds late. Hard grader. I don't really recommend her

Ms. Davis is very picky and can be hard to follow during the lesson sometimes.  However, she is really not a bad teacher.  She really knows math well, so as long as you just do the work it will be fine. She has an SI whose sessions are a HUGE help (bonus pts on test are given for going to SI)! One easy group project & she replaces lowest test grade

IF you're looking for a laid back class, THIS IS NOT IT!!! She is very picky and in my opinion she did not explain things very well. If you miss a day of class youre completely lost. she does homework checks EVERY CLASS DAY. therefore, if you miss a class you have to go the next day early in the morning to make it up or you get a 0. Not recommended

I hate math its very confusing to me, but ms. Davis really explains the material well. The SI is also very helpful. She takes time out of class to help you so feel free to ask questions. She grades kinda tough, but only because she pays attention to detail.
All I'ma say is RUN!!! You'll thank me later. Davis is VERY petty!!!!!! She kicks ppl out of class just for asking your neighbor what page are we on! Thought I was elementary school!

If you need step by step instructions in math, you will greatly appreciate Ms. Davis. She's a retired High School teacher so keep that in mind, come to class do, do your work, and you will enjoy her class. She's always there early and willing to help ANYTIME!! Great experience for me after not having math for 15 years!

TAKE DAVIS.  She is tough but the BEST 1101 teacher at KSU. You must go to every class and do expect a lot of homework. What makes her class great is her Student Teacher - Lindsey. Without Lin I would not have caught on. I don't have a math brain but the two of them got me through it. It's over and I'm happy with my B+. All smiles here.

I felt that she graded unfarely. Shes very picky about how you turn in things and about writting in pencil. Homework quizzes and tests are easy. She's an easy A if you suck it up and deal with the pet peeves. ps. make sure your there on your project day!..She makes it mandatory..

If you are good at Math, AVOID! The only reason I took this class was so I would be a full time student If you solve a problem a different way than how she thinks it should be solved it is wrong (I got points taken off for using log instead of solving in the 10^x format) Daily quizzes which drastically lower your grade if you miss them.

I felt as if I was back in high school. AVOID!! Rude teacher, took off points for stupid minuscule details just because it was not how she wanted it. Homework EVERY CLASS. She wastes class time telling pointless stories. Hard to understand sometimes because of her THICK country accent. Again I warn you, AVOID!!
AVOID!  This lady has serious anger management problems.  Very rude and inconsiderate.  Consider yourself warned. AVOID!

Just like a middle or high school math teacher! She can be rude to students and talk over them if they are trying to ask a question or point out something. Her homework and tests are objective and come straight from her test review. Attendance not mandatory but quiz every class. An easy A but must do exactly as she says!

Imagine your middle school math teacher... there goes Ms. Davis. She talks about every example in the book. BUT she is very equipped in her field. She does a study guide for every test and makes you do them because they ARE the tests, just changed numbers. Attendance is a must. This is a point system which helps your grade.. a lot.

There's a difference in "challenging" & "ridiculous." I'm stuck in high school, & forget trying to concentrate. She's picky about things that don't matter & won't be available if you need help after class. She teaches by reading straight outta the text, so there's no need to go to class-but wait! It's mandatory! I would have learned more NOT going.
I'm back in highschool. God help me!

Teaches like your worst high school nightmare.  HW every night, short quiz every day, makes attendance mandatory or else, and tests are graded ridiculously.  She doesn't stop talking during tests either!

She is NOT HELPFUL AT ALL! She is too busy eating her breakfast to help, or too tired or just in a bad mood. I got help from other classmates, almost never from her. She is a chatterbox and does not even shut up during the tests we take...VERY distracting. I would get any other professor besides her.

This was my second attempt at Math Modeling, my first professor was terrible and I had to drop the class. But Mrs. Davis was a breath of fresh air.  She has had a lot of experience in high school, but this is helpful as she teaches for those who aren't so proficient in math, which I am not. I would definitely recommend her.

I LOVED HER in math modeling!  I have a 99 in her class.  If u go to class and do ur hw the test are easy! She gives u reviews that are almost exactly like the test. Ppl don't like her bc she actually makes you do work.  But you can't learn math without actually doing it (retards). So it's a good thing she treats you like high schoolers. LOVED HER.

Ms. Davis is clearly sad she retired from teaching high school.  She treats every student, no matter your age, like you are still in H.S., and is very unapproachable.  She wastes time by telling senseless stories, and doesn't allow for any errors or 'stupid questions.'  She honestly makes you feel like you are even too stupid to be in an 1101 class

She teaches like she's straight out of high school. You have homework and quizzes everyday. She talks about hunting, her health and a lot of other stuff that has nothing to do with math. She has her favorites and if you talk and skip class, she'll treat you like crap! Go everyday, don't skip classes!

she tells stories goes really fast and teaches like a freaking high school teacher you have a quiz everyday and its not that its hard i just hated her style personally, its lesson hw and you must be soo specific with your answers would never consider again!  I can't wait for pre calc!  math modeling is an easy subject but ATTEND HER CLASS ERDAY!

shes so funny.she goes off on these random hunting, redneck storys and its halarious.class is always the same:learn the material, do odd numbers in homework(copy out of back), then quiz over one problem the next day. attendance is mandatory.1 project in the semester.kinda snaps on you when you ask a dumb question. Easy teacher, id take her again!
WONDERFUL !
Great teacher. She does teach like you're in high school but shes easy as long as you do all your homework

well....she teaches WELL!!! know exactly whats on the tests....WAY too much homework considering she gave us easy problems to solve....she seemed **** and unapproachable....very high school like which i dont like, i do not think shes good enough to teach college

Ok, I failed the Compass exam, had to take Math 098 and 099 and made a C and a B in both. I was shaking when I got to 1101, but Ms. Davis is the best! She is not going to be your cool best friend but she is so crystal clear on what is expected of you on tests and replaces a test grade with your final. Do your homework and come every day. I got an A
She's mean and treats you like you are in high school but thank the LORD i passed her class the first time.

She is the easiest professor I've ever had! I've never done well in math and I made a 96.  LOTS of homework, and daily quizzes from your homework. but she always gives odds so you can get the answers. Gives study guides that are very similar toe exams!

She is just like a high school teacher. You get h/w each class and one ques. used as a quiz for the next class but it is very helpful. She gives test reviews which are identical to tests and final except that the numbers are changed. Attendance is mandatory and lots of extra credit is given.

I really did not like this class. She was not very helpful and I dreaded going everyday. Although she was pretty easy, don't take this class if you need one-on-one help. The book is definitely needed. She assigns homework every night and gives a homework quiz at the beginning of each class. AH!

This is the easiest math class you will ever take.  She teaches like you are still in high school, which is one of the reasons its so easy.  Do your homework, and there is no way you won't get an A (even if you suck at math)

I am terrible at math but managed to get an A in this class! Lots of homework BUT she counts it as part of your grade so it's EASY to pass as long as you keep up with the work. Tests are relatively simple and she always gives a review sheet. Do the busy work and you will do fine!

She is super nice even though she seems to go on tangents about absolutely nothing. She is very straight forward and if you have trouble with math, its like a highschool class which was good for me. Do your homework and review and your good.
Shes a really good teacher! but the homework feels as if youre back in highschool! Her tests are easy too, and the final replaces your lowest test score!!
Her class is so easy. She takes attendance, lots of book work and homework checks. Easy tests, very specific about how she wants things but good and EASY tests overall.
She was a great math teacher. I enjoyed her class very much. She always kept it interesting. I would take her again for sure. She is one of the most helpful toeachers ive had.

I dreaded taking Math, but this professor was the best. She taught at a good pace for everyone and was very helpful. This was my first A in a math class. It was not easy, but she helped make it happen by being a good professor. If you are like me and hadnt taken a math class since highschool, then take Mrs. Davis, you won't regret it!

She is a great professor. Math is not my strong point. If you study, attend every class, and work well with your group, you will get an A. It is NOT an easy A. You actually have to work for it but it is very possible. Choose good group members, get to class everyday on time, and do the homework and you will be fine.
Awful. Horriable. Worst class ever. Do NOT take.
Great teacher, gives a lot of homework but it is not difficult if you go to class.  She is very helpful as long as you go to class and show respect. I got an A and would defintely take her again.

this class is so easy, and the mrs. davis is an excellent teacher. there is a lot of group work, so if you can't understand the subject, your classmates can help you, too. i never studied once and got an a.

She seems to care. She gives study guides which are really helpful. There was lots of group work and homework which was also helpful. BUT she goes really fast and doesn't give enough examples. She is not very approachable or helpful when you have questions. She also can be rude and harsh.

If your not willing to work for your grade, if you don't plan on attending class, and if you hate group work & homework, this class ISN'T for you.  We had homeork just about every nite, she never checked it but it was good practice.  We graphed alot and a graphing calculator is NEEDED.Your have to work for your grade in this class.Shes pretty fair
Wasn't helpful at all! Even when I came into class early, she still put me off on other students. I would not recommend this teacher to anybody who have problems with math.

Take good notes if you can. She talks way too fast at times, but what she says it helpful if you understand it. Her tests are identical to her study guides, which is incredibly helpful! I would recoment taking her if you can take a little bit of attitude and a few rude comments at times. I would take her again.

Did not teach same as other classes so could not get help.  Impatient and demanding and required many hours of group work with large project that no other classes had.  Got A in spite of teacher thanks to help from math lab.
I loved this class!! It was the most benefical math class I have ever taken! She is very clear in her lecture, she teaches very well. Gives study guides for test! Wanda is the best ever!!!!!!!
not clear with lessons. didn't want to help and if you don't understand the material she gets offended. easy grader and helps with answers on tests.

Definately recommend her! Can understand when you have problems outside class. Easy to talk to and ask questions. Will answer questions during tests, which consist only of problems on the review study sheet. Gives you second chances on work you totally screw up ;) Will take her class again if she teaches a higher math!

She's the best Math teacher I've ever had! Explains every concept thoroughly so you can't possibly get confused..very knitpicky, but a wonderful teacher with great stories! She understands when you can't be in class as long as you explain :) Definately love her teaching!!

She is very helpful and wants to make sure that the students understand statistic concepts.  You'll do well in her class if you read the book and class notes.  She has really interesting examples.  Her class activities helped keep me alert in class.
pretty easy
No Comments
She can be intimidating at times, but is extremely fair. An A is attainable with limited effort.
the work is easy and she explains things but if u get stuck with a bad group like me u r screwed b/c all u do is group work, she is a good teacher though

class is very easy.. everything is explained well but she treats everyone like they are in high school.  a lot of work is done in groups- can be good or bad, depending on your group, and she picks the groups and its your group for the semester
I really enjoyed this teacher. She is really nice and is willing to help you when she can. I wish she taught higher level math courses, because I would definately be in them.

I like Mrs. Davis. This is the first math class I have been able to understand completely. She explains very well. She can get real testy and make you afraid to ask questions. One bad thing is that she doesn't take excused notes, even for tests. Who says she has the authoriy to do that?

Do not take her. She thinks she is still teaching 14 year olds. Very disrespectfull no matter what your age. God forbid you have to ask her to expand on a concept she is covering... she will give you a panic attack.

Ms. King's class was a joy. I finally found a math class where I could find some skills where I'm good. Even when a student is doing terribly, she will do anything in her power to help you, as long as you cooperate. Group work is fun and productive.
